text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states: 'The Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works is the foundational treaty here. Both the US and Italy are signatories. Under the Berne Convention's principle of national treatment (Article 5), your client's work is entitled to the same protection in Italy that Italian authors receive under Italian law.'
